function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of real-time iaq monitoring can lead to delayed detection of unhealthy indoor air conditions, increasing the risk of exposure to contaminants.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient iaq monitoring systems may result in prolonged exposure to poor indoor air quality, especially in rural areas where specific requirements may be overlooked.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and access to iaq monitoring systems for non-tech savvy individuals can hinder the adoption of preventive measures and lead to prolonged exposure to unhealthy indoor air.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on real-time iaq monitoring systems in real scenarios may lead to exposure to contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased exposure to indoor air pollutants in village areas due to the use of solid fuels, leading to higher risk of respiratory diseases and infections.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on designing suitable iaq management systems for village areas may lead to neglecting the health of rural populations and hindering overall medical health improvement efforts.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive monitoring systems for contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of the impact of environmental factors on indoor air quality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited knowledge of early research studies in the field of indoor air quality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher cost and massive power consumption of sensor nodes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sensor calibration as a challenge for accurate real-time monitoring","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on resistive heating sensors leading to energy consumption","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Realtime monitoring of iaq parameters may introduce privacy concerns for building occupants.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on iot for realtime monitoring may lead to system failures, causing hazardous conditions to go undetected.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Greater interaction with the physical world through iot increases the risk of cyber attacks and unauthorized access to iaq monitoring systems.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited research on prediction systems for iaq monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low performance of non-iot based iaq monitoring systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges with sensor calibration and practical implementation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wsn based systems using zig-bee as the communication protocol","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High latency in wsn-based iaq monitoring systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Iot based systems for iaq monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to volatile organic compounds vocs such as xylene, ethylbenzene, toluene, and benzene in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality iaq leading to potential health risks for residents","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weaknesses in existing iaq monitoring systems leading to unreliable data and potential health risks for residents","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of sensors without proper calibration could lead to inaccurate measurements of iaq parameters.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper data transmission strategy may result in high power consumption and redundant network traffic.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to reduce computational burden of sensing nodes may lead to shorter battery life of the monitoring system.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low-cost iaq monitor may have limited accuracy and reliability, leading to incorrect measurements of pollutants.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and pollutant levels may go unnoticed due to limited monitoring parameters.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on statistical analysis software ibm spss statistics for data analysis may introduce errors or biases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of sensor nodes to measure gaseous pollutants may lead to potential contamination if not properly maintained.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of smart mobile standards, wsn, and other sensing technologies may introduce cybersecurity risks if not properly secured.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Designing separate battery units for the sensor network introduces the risk of battery failure and data loss if not monitored effectively.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of monitoring for indoor air quality iaq parameters such as humidity, temperature, gaseous pollutants, and pm.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or delayed estimation of atmospheric changes and pollutants in indoor environments.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited or no access to real-time iaq monitoring and exposure risk updates for building occupants.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper air quality monitoring leading to potential exposure to air contaminants and pollutants.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor air quality assessment leading to potential health risks from indoor pollutants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Usage of high integrity serial bus protocol can may lead to potential data breaches or security vulnerabilities.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of low-cost micro gas sensors and arduino microcontroller may result in inaccurate iaq monitoring and data quality issues.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on wireless communication using zigbee module may introduce interference and communication disruptions in iaq monitoring system.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious disease spread due to poor air quality monitoring and control system","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate air quality prediction leading to inadequate control measures","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on
